name: The Orchard
description: The Orchard is one-stop hub for information, events, and social gathering at libraries. Made with Duncan Mazza, Michael Remley, Jamie Santiago, and Bennett Taylor.

name: BOOMCRASH Music Glove
description: An interactive glove powered by Arduino and Max/MSP that creates reactive sound based off of sensor input and gesture. Made with Reid Bowen, Katie Foster, Shirin Kuppusamy, and Becca Suchower.

name: Linda's Oxygen Bag
description: A handmade, bespoke bag for an older adult's busy life. Made with Emma Freedman, Hadleigh Nunes, and our co-creator and stakeholder Linda.

name: Creature Design
description: A collection of naturalistic creature and monster designs made over the course of a semester at RISD.

name: Video Game Soundracks
description: I have done commissioned and personal work for video game soundtracks. I make experimental electronic music with an emphasis on percussion, rhythm, and texture.

name: Virtual Reality
description: During my semester at RISD, I learned numerous VR creation tools like Tiltbrush, Masterpiece VR, and Unity. I created multiple explorable interactive worlds and 3D assets. Some of these, including works in progress, are featured on the linked website; A full collection of personal videos will be shared shortly!

name: Max/MSP Generative Music Machine
description: Using Max/MSP, I created a multi-module program for generating music. The Beat Selector module creates a coherent rhythm in an AAA-B, AAA-C pattern by selecting from 17 beat loops. The Bass Pattern allows for user-drawn, preset, and randomly generated sequences to play. The Mystery Sound keyboard uses an additive synthesizer subpatch (not visible in demo video) and generates random points on 6 oscillator envelopes to create a unique "mystery sound".

name: Zines
description: I am a founding member of Olin's Zine Club with a passion for the accessibility and creativity of self-published works. My most ambitious work is The Trans Sex Zine (18+), an over-30 page collaboration featuring honest discussions of transgender peoples' relationships to sex. I have several other miniature zines that have been posted on my Instagram.These will eventually be migrated to this website due to my loathing of social media and Instagram in particular. I also enjoy more complicated bookbinding, and have taught workshops on softcover and hardcover techniques.

name: Character Sculpture
description: I sculpt miniature character statuettes, primarily in an anime-inspired style. I am experimenting with posability and have successfully sculpted an articulated, posable mermaid doll with an interchangeable lower half.

name: Environment Design Art
description: I illustrated all characters and environments for my Ludum Dare game, What Would Make Me Feel Alive, in 72 hours. Made in collaboration with Clark Pohl and Eriel Wiston.

name: Calculus with Flat Stanley
description: I illustrated and designed a comic to intuitively teach the concept of limits to young (elementary-school and older) students. Co-written with Sam Daitzman.
